          <title>
            <string language="en">Force measurement using a force meter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftmessen mit einem Kraftmeßinstrument</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mesure de force à l'aide d'un mètre de force</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">Medida de la fuerza usando un contador de la 
fuerza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows an experimental set up for measuring the force exerted in pulling a sliding box.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein experimentelles

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um experimental ajustado

            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πειραματική ίδρυση για τη

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un experimental
